replies.body:
>  June 23, 2017 00:00 PT through June 26, 2017 23:59 PT! 

What?
My first thought was "who the hell is gravedigging?"  My second that was "Rito plz."
Ya I saw that. 1 month and 1 day ago.
This is a test to see who is worthy.
It's been 5 hours now. Is Riot really not gonna acknowledge this screw-up?

I'm still trying to figure out when Warlord Shen chromas will be on sale for IP.

They haven't had their first RP sale yet, have they? That means they can't be on sale for IP for at least a month.

The first IP chroma sale this year was in February, wasn't it? That means the second one will probably be in August. If the Warlord Shen chromas haven't had their first RP sale yet, then they won't go on sale for IP in the next IP chroma sale.

So the Warlord Shen chromas will probably be on sale for IP around February next year?

I thought the Monthly Early Sales had more than 1 Skin and 2 Chromas.
Disappointed yet again; even without the typos.

lol

I saw the announcement for this sale back in May, but I went ahead and picked up one of the Chromas earlier this month because I figured someone forgot to publish the article and thus the sale had to be scrapped. That's too bad. Nice for those who demonstrated more patience though.

_UNLESS, OF COURSE..._
This very article was posted by mistake and the sale will not be happening after all!

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
The July early sale already happened too...
this is some kinda confusion... :/ it's already july... so it's not an early sale but a late sale...
Damn wtf is taking riot so long to fix
